text:
Nervous Encounters

<Raskolnikov in his dim room, anxious.>
<Thoughts swirl in his mind.>  
Raskolnikov: “What does Porfiry want now?”  

---

<Raskolnikov in the hallway, tense.>  
<An unexpected meeting looms.>  
Raskolnikov: “I must settle Svidrigaïlov soon.”  

Porfiry: “Surprised to see you, Rodion.”  
Raskolnikov: “What brings you here?”  

Porfiry: “Just passing by, thought I’d drop in.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov feels a renewed clarity and determination as he contemplates settling his conflicts with Svidrigaïlov and Porfiry.
